article_title: Longs Peak Scottish/Irish Highland Festival in full swing
article_text:
Print Email Font Resize Font Resize Longs Peak Scottish/Irish Highland Festival in full swing

The massed pipe bands enter the arena during Thursday night's opening Estes Tattoo. The tattoo is the gathering of all of the marching bands of the festival. (Walt Hester) The massed pipe bands enter the arena during Thursday night's opening Estes Tattoo. The tattoo is the gathering of all of the marching bands of the festival.
